title: Untitled Goose Game sketchbook: Michael McMaster
credit_line:
Gift of House House Pty Ltd.
Acquired via the National videogame collecting partnership between ACMI, the Powerhouse and the National Film and Sound Archive.
brief_description: A selection of drawings, sketches and notes from Michael McMaster’s sketchbook made while he was co-creating the videogame Untitled Goose Game with House House.
description: A selection of drawings, sketches and notes from Michael McMaster’s sketchbook made while he was co-creating the videogame Untitled Goose Game with House House.
